name: EarthFacts
0:
”Alexa open Earth facts”
”Alexa ask Earth facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell Earth facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: earth facts
des:
Ask for Earth Facts, and learn about our Mother, the Earth.

Earth Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Earth Facts" or "Alexa, open Earth Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
